mapper.select: SELECT CASE no WHEN 2 THEN d.error_gubun + ' 계' WHEN 3 THEN 'Total' ELSE error_gubun END error_gubun , CASE no WHEN 1 THEN d.error_cd END error_cd , max(CASE no WHEN 1 THEN d.error_msg WHEN 2 THEN d.error_gubun + ' 계' END) error_msg , coalesce(sum(send_cnt),0) send_cnt , CASE no WHEN 2 THEN 1 WHEN 3 THEN 3 ELSE 0 END gid FROM ( SELECT CASE c.cd_cat WHEN 'C00011' THEN 'Soft Bounce' WHEN 'C00021' THEN 'Hard Bounce' END error_gubun , b.error_cd, sum(b.send_cnt) send_cnt, max(coalesce(c.val, 'Unknown Error')) error_msg FROM nvsendresult a, nvdomainlog b LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT cd, val, cd_cat FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat IN ('C00011', 'C00021') AND lang = #{lang} ) c ON b.error_cd = c.cd WHERE a.result_seq = b.result_seq AND (a.RESEND_STS IS NULL OR a.RESEND_STS = 'F') AND b.campaign_no = #{campaignNo} AND b.error_cd != 250 GROUP BY c.cd_cat, b.error_cd ) d, ( SELECT no FROM copy_t WHERE no <= 3 ) e GROUP BY CASE no WHEN 2 THEN error_gubun + ' 계' WHEN 3 THEN 'Total' ELSE error_gubun END, no, CASE no WHEN 1 THEN error_cd END ORDER BY error_gubun, error_cd, gid
